title: Upload food photo with caption
want: upload a food photo with a caption
benefit: I can share my culinary creations with my followers
criteria: Creator can select a photo from device gallery or take a new photo
Creator can add a text caption up to a defined character limit
Post appears in followers' feeds after publishing
Uploaded images are compressed and optimized for fast loading
subtasks: Implement image picker and camera integration
Build post creation form with caption input
Create backend API endpoint for post creation with image upload
Integrate cloud storage for image hosting and CDN delivery

title: Attach structured recipe data to post
want: attach structured recipe data including ingredients, steps, cook time, servings, and difficulty
benefit: my followers can cook the dish themselves
criteria: Creator can add a list of ingredients with quantities and units
Creator can add numbered cooking steps
Creator can specify cook time, servings, and difficulty level
Recipe data renders in a structured, readable format on the post detail screen
subtasks: Design recipe data schema and database models
Build recipe input form with dynamic ingredient and step fields
Create API endpoints for recipe CRUD operations
Implement recipe display component on post detail view

title: Upload multiple images in a single post (carousel)
want: upload multiple images in a single post as a carousel
benefit: I can show the cooking process or different angles of the dish
criteria: Creator can select and upload multiple images in one post
Images display as a swipeable carousel in the feed and detail view
Carousel includes pagination indicators showing current position
A maximum image count per post is enforced
subtasks: Implement multi-image selection in the image picker
Build carousel/swipeable image component for display
Update post creation API to handle multiple image uploads
Add image ordering and reordering support in the creation flow

title: Upload short-form video content
want: upload short-form video content
benefit: I can share cooking tutorials and food reels with my audience
criteria: Creator can upload a video from device or record a new one
Videos are limited to a maximum duration (e.g., 60 seconds)
Videos are transcoded and optimized for streaming playback
Video posts display with a play button and autoplay in feed on mute
subtasks: Implement video picker and recording integration
Set up server-side video transcoding pipeline
Build video player component with playback controls
Integrate video CDN for adaptive streaming delivery

title: Tag post with categories
want: tag my post with categories such as cuisine type, meal type, and dietary tags
benefit: my content is discoverable by users interested in those categories
criteria: Creator can select one or more cuisine type tags (e.g., Italian, Japanese)
Creator can select meal type tags (e.g., breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack)
Creator can select dietary tags (e.g., vegan, gluten-free, keto)
Tags are displayed on the post and are searchable/filterable
subtasks: Define tag taxonomy and seed database with initial tag values
Build tag selection UI component with search/filter
Create API for associating tags with posts
Index tags for search and feed filtering

title: Save post as draft before publishing
want: save a post as a draft before publishing
benefit: I can refine the content later before making it public
criteria: Creator can save an in-progress post as a draft
Drafts are accessible from a dedicated drafts section in the profile
Creator can resume editing a draft and publish it when ready
Drafts are not visible to other users
subtasks: Add draft status field to the post data model
Implement save-as-draft button in the post creation flow
Build drafts list view accessible from the creator profile
Create API endpoints for listing, updating, and publishing drafts

title: Edit post after publishing
want: edit my post's caption, tags, and recipe data after publishing
benefit: I can correct mistakes or improve the content
criteria: Creator can edit caption text on a published post
Creator can add, remove, or change tags on a published post
Creator can update recipe data on a published post
An 'edited' indicator is shown on modified posts
subtasks: Build edit post screen pre-populated with existing post data
Create API endpoint for updating post fields
Add edit timestamp tracking to post model
Implement authorization check ensuring only the post owner can edit

title: Delete own posts
want: delete my own posts
benefit: I can remove content I no longer want published
criteria: Creator can delete any of their own posts
A confirmation dialog is shown before deletion
Deleted posts are removed from all feeds, profiles, and collections
Associated media files are cleaned up from storage
subtasks: Add delete button with confirmation dialog to post options menu
Create API endpoint for soft-deleting posts
Implement cascading cleanup of likes, comments, bookmarks, and media
Add authorization check ensuring only the post owner can delete

title: Scroll through personalized home feed
want: scroll through a personalized home feed
benefit: I can discover relevant food content tailored to my interests
criteria: User sees a feed of posts ranked by relevance to their interests
Feed considers user interactions, followed accounts, and preferred categories
Feed displays post image/video, caption preview, author info, and engagement counts
New users see a curated default feed until personalization data is available
subtasks: Design feed ranking algorithm incorporating engagement signals and preferences
Build feed API endpoint with cursor-based pagination
Implement feed UI with post card components
Set up feed caching layer for performance

title: Switch between For You and Following feeds
want: switch between a 'For You' algorithmic feed and a 'Following' chronological feed
benefit: I can choose between discovering new content and seeing posts from people I follow
criteria: Feed screen has tabs or toggle for 'For You' and 'Following'
'For You' feed uses algorithmic ranking for content discovery
'Following' feed shows posts only from followed accounts in reverse chronological order
Selected feed preference persists within the session
subtasks: Build tab/toggle UI component for feed switching
Implement 'Following' feed query filtered to followed accounts
Implement 'For You' feed query with algorithmic ranking
Persist last-selected feed tab in local state

title: View full post detail with recipe
want: view the full post detail screen with the complete recipe, ingredients, and cooking steps
benefit: I can follow the recipe and cook the dish
criteria: Tapping a post in the feed opens a full detail screen
Detail screen shows full-resolution image/video, complete caption, and author info
Recipe section displays ingredients list, numbered steps, cook time, servings, and difficulty
User can scroll through all content and interact (like, comment, save) from the detail screen
subtasks: Build post detail screen layout with all content sections
Create API endpoint for fetching full post data including recipe
Implement recipe display component with ingredients and steps formatting
Add navigation from feed post card to detail screen

title: Optimized feed loading with pagination
want: the feed to load fast with optimized image and video delivery and infinite scroll pagination
benefit: I have a smooth, uninterrupted browsing experience
criteria: Feed loads initial batch of posts within acceptable performance threshold
Images and videos are served via CDN with appropriate compression and caching
Additional posts load automatically as the user scrolls near the bottom
Loading indicators are shown during fetch without blocking existing content
subtasks: Implement cursor-based infinite scroll pagination on frontend
Configure CDN and image optimization pipeline with responsive sizes
Add lazy loading for off-screen images and videos
Implement skeleton loading placeholders during data fetch

title: Pull-to-refresh feed
want: pull-to-refresh my feed to see the latest posts
benefit: I can quickly check for new content without restarting the app
criteria: Pulling down on the feed triggers a refresh animation and data reload
Feed updates with the latest posts after refresh completes
Scroll position resets to the top on refresh
A visual indicator confirms when the refresh is complete
subtasks: Implement pull-to-refresh gesture handler on the feed scroll view
Trigger feed API refetch on pull-to-refresh activation
Add refresh animation and completion indicator
Reset pagination cursor on refresh

title: Like and unlike a post
want: like and unlike a post
benefit: I can express appreciation for content I enjoy
criteria: User can tap a heart/like button to like a post
Tapping again unlikes the post (toggle behavior)
Like count updates in real time on the post
Like state persists and is reflected correctly across sessions
subtasks: Build like/unlike toggle button with animation
Create API endpoints for liking and unliking posts
Implement optimistic UI update for instant feedback
Add like count to post data model and feed response

title: Comment on a post
want: comment on a post
benefit: I can ask questions or share my thoughts about the content
criteria: User can type and submit a comment on any post
Comments appear in chronological order below the post
Comment count is displayed on the post in the feed
User can delete their own comments
subtasks: Build comment input field and submit button on post detail screen
Create API endpoints for creating, listing, and deleting comments
Implement comment list component with pagination
Add comment count to post data model and feed response

title: Reply to comments (threaded comments)
want: reply to comments to create threaded conversations
benefit: conversations stay organized and easy to follow
criteria: User can tap 'Reply' on a comment to respond directly
Replies are visually nested under the parent comment
Thread can be expanded or collapsed for readability
Reply authors are notified of responses to their comments
subtasks: Add parent_comment_id field to comment data model for threading
Build threaded comment display with indentation and collapse/expand
Implement reply input that references the parent comment
Create notification trigger for replies to a user's comment

title: Save/bookmark a post to a collection
want: save or bookmark a post to a collection
benefit: I can easily find it later when I want to cook that recipe
criteria: User can tap a bookmark icon to save a post
User is prompted to select or create a collection when saving
Saved posts are accessible from the user's profile
User can unsave/remove a bookmark from a post
subtasks: Build bookmark toggle button on post card and detail screen
Create API endpoints for saving and unsaving posts
Implement collection picker modal shown on save action
Add saved/bookmarked state to post response for the current user

title: Share a post externally
want: share a post externally via copy link or share to other apps
benefit: I can share great food content with friends outside the platform
criteria: User can tap a share button on any post
Share options include copying a direct link to the post
Share options include sharing to other apps via the native share sheet
Shared links open the post in-app or on the web if the app is not installed
subtasks: Generate shareable deep link URLs for posts
Implement native share sheet integration
Add copy-to-clipboard functionality for post links
Set up deep link handling for incoming shared links

title: Report inappropriate content
want: report inappropriate content
benefit: the platform remains safe and welcoming for all users
criteria: User can tap a 'Report' option from the post options menu
User can select a report reason from a predefined list (spam, harassment, etc.)
A confirmation is shown after the report is submitted
Reported content is flagged for moderator review
subtasks: Build report flow UI with reason selection and optional description
Create API endpoint for submitting content reports
Implement report data model with status tracking for moderation
Add report option to post options menu

title: Create named collections
want: create named collections such as 'Weeknight Dinners' or 'Desserts'
benefit: I can organize my saved posts into meaningful categories
criteria: User can create a new collection with a custom name
User can rename or delete existing collections
Collections are listed in the user's profile under a collections tab
Each collection shows a preview thumbnail and post count
subtasks: Design collection data model with name, owner, and cover image
Build create/edit collection form with name input
Create API endpoints for collection CRUD operations
Implement collections list view with thumbnails and counts

title: Add and remove posts from collections
want: add and remove posts from my collections
benefit: I can curate and manage the content in each collection
criteria: User can add a post to one or more collections from the bookmark action
User can remove a post from a collection
Collection contents update immediately after adding or removing
Post's saved state reflects whether it exists in any collection
subtasks: Build collection picker with checkboxes for multi-select
Create API endpoints for adding and removing posts from collections
Implement remove-from-collection action within the collection view
Update bookmark state based on collection membership

title: Browse collections from profile
want: browse my collections from my profile
benefit: I can easily access and revisit my organized saved content
criteria: User's profile has a collections tab or section
Collections are displayed as a grid with cover images and names
Tapping a collection opens it and shows all saved posts inside
Posts within a collection can be viewed in detail by tapping
subtasks: Add collections tab to the user profile screen
Build collection grid view with cover image and name
Create collection detail view showing contained posts
Implement API endpoint for fetching user's collections with previews
